settings.content: Not all cacao is treated equally! From harvesting to fermentation and onto the ongoing TLC in which our beans are treated with, we pride ourselves in having the ability to offer the absolute highest quality cacao beans.In order to ensure a truly unique experience, we partnered with a local craft chocolate expert who sources single origin beans directly from their partner farmers in Ghana, Africa. The cacao plantation where we receive our beans from is known for producing the highest quality traceable cacao in the region. This cacao’s classic rich and fudgy flavor is representative of what most of us have come to know and love in premium craft chocolate. Upon receiving a nice fresh batch, the beans are carefully handcrafted in small batches (bean-to-bar) to extract the highest quality of flavors possible. Tasting notes: Perfectly balanced with rich, nutty, fudgy with natural sweet notes.

When embarking on this journey to create the first real superfood craft chocolate bar, we wanted to choose a sweetner that would embody delicious natural flavors that would complement our beans: We chose Organic Dates! Dates are well known for their incredible health profile which include (but not limited to) high levels of health promoting antioxidants, minerals, vitamins and fibers.Their flavor profile, being sweet, bold and creamy serve as the perfect sweetener to our cacao beans, making this heavenly chocolate blend! Super yummy as well as highly nourishing.

Both almonds and hazelnuts are a great source of nutrients such as protein, vitamins, minerals, healthy fats & fibers. Our entire selection of premium organic nuts are gently roasted in the perfect temperature to bring out sweet, crunchy & toasty flavors. We then evenly crumble the nuts into our chocolate to ensure that each bite is a perfect bite.

Both almonds and hazelnuts are a great source of nutrients such as protein, vitamins, minerals, healthy fats & fibers. Our entire selection of premium organic nuts are gently roasted in the perfect temperature to bring out sweet, crunchy & toasty flavors. We then evenly crumble the nuts into our chocolate to ensure that each bite is a perfect bite.
Coconuts are another great source of essential vitamins, minerals and healthy fats. We use organic unsweetened coconut flakes which are gently toasted to provide a natural caramelized-crunch flavor.

Not all coffee is equal! The right source of coffee is rich in antioxidants, healthy fibers and essential vitamins & minerals. For our espresso crunch bar, we use beans that are round, nutty & chocolat. Medium-dark roasted to complement our chocolate blend perfectly.

Tahini is one of the healthiest and most delicious butter spreads out there! Made from toasted ground sesame seeds, tahini has tremendous nutritional value: Stacked with healthy fats, vitamins & minerals & antioxidants, tahini serves as the perfect match for our chocolate blend to bring an extra creamy & delicious experience.

Our Pure Orange Oil is all-natural, cold pressed from the rind of fresh oranges providing a perfectly balanced sweet & citrusy flavor. This process is similar to the way extra virgin olive oil is produced. Not to be confused with extracts, our oil is 100% pure oil with no alcohol or water added.

From helping keep a proper balance of water & minerals to promoting strong vascular health, salt is an essential ingredient for maintaining a healthy diet. We use unprocessed premium sea salt to bring out the natural flavors of the dominant ingredients found in our selected bars
